overview:
Vivian has extensive experience in international marketing and sales, opening up markets in North & South America, Middle East and Eastern Asia. Her most recent venture is product and business development with a developer of comedic virtual worlds.

She is a member of Likemind and a local Likemind leader. Likeminders meet once a month to discuss trends. Likemind was inspired by PSFK in NYC. www.psfk.com & www.likemind.us
